programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.sub-title: Have I Got a Bit More Old News for You
programme.desc: Black Mirror creator and satirist Charlie Brooker hosts an extended edition of the satirical current affairs quiz from November 2016, with actress Maureen Lipman and comedian Rich Hall joining captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton to poke fun at the week's news.

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: David Mitchell and Lee Mack are joined by radio presenter Sara Cox, comedian Jason Manford, journalist Nick Robinson and actor Harry Shearer, who aim to help the team captains deceive their opponents with plausible lies. Hosted by Rob Brydon.

programme.title: Hypothetical
programme.desc: Ed Gamble, Nish Kumar, Sara Pascoe and Lou Sanders are posed increasingly absurd hypothetical situations. Hosted by Josh Widdicombe and James Acaster.

programme.title: Zapped
programme.desc: Looking to make friends, Brian heads to a trendy new bar, but he finds himself a big hit with the clientele, so something must be awry.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Blackadder
programme.desc: A morale-boosting stage show offers Captain Blackadder a route out of the trenches, but he soon finds his plans heading for disaster when Gen Melchett falls for the leading lady - Lt George. First World War comedy, with Rowan Atkinson, Tony Robinson and Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: The Enola Gay drops the first atomic bomb on Hiroshima in August 1945 as America bids to secure an unconditional surrender from the Japanese, even though conventional bombing raids had already flattened the country. Narrated by Laurence Olivier.

programme.title: Operation Gold Rush with Dan Snow
programme.desc: Dan Snow, Felicity Aston and Dr Kevin Fong finally arrive at the end of their gruelling journey in Dawson City. They set up a traditional mining camp in the heart of the gold fields, before facing their next challenge. They have just five days to find gold in an area that has already been heavily mined, and can only use the back-breaking methods of the 19th-century early pioneers.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Feature length episode. The violent murder of an elderly woman leads the police to collar a known felon _ but Sam launches her own alternative investigation, convinced the real culprit is still at large. Amanda Burton and Mick Ford star.

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Neil Manson clashes with his father-in-law when he learns the former Deputy Assistant Commissioner's involvement with underage boys has left him open to blackmail. Sam Nixon discovers the body of a missing Muslim estate agent and makes Phil Hunter jealous by arranging a date with the dead man's boss, while Gina's drinking leads to a complaint that could end her career. Andrew Lancel and Scott Maslen star.

programme.title: London's Burning
programme.desc: As the factory blaze continues, Hallam is forced back into the burning building to save three trapped girls and ends up falling from a collapsed platform.

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Michelle and Shelly are back from Amsterdam - but what has happened to Mark and Clem?.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Press Preview
programme.desc: A preview of the stories appearing in tomorrow's national newspapers.

programme.title: Sky News
programme.desc: A summary of the latest news headlines.

programme.title: Ian King Live
programme.desc: All the day's business news live from Sky's City of London studio, with Ian King.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Freeze Out
programme.desc: Game show of skill and quizzing ability in which contestants compete at a giant circular ice table for the chance to manoeuvre gliding sliders on a large game board, hoping to eventually secure a jackpot of Â£10,000. Hosted by Mark Durden-Smith, with former Premier League referee Uriah Rennie.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Judge Rinder
programme.desc: Cameras follow criminal barrister Robert Rinder as he takes on real-life cases in a studio courtroom.

programme.title: Late Night Magic
programme.desc: We're taking you all the way through the night with soem of the best tracks of all time.

programme.title: Kisstory: Old Skool & Anthems
programme.desc: It's time to go back in time with KISSTORY! The biggest old skool anthems ever from your favourite artists.

programme.title: Up All Night! Kiss Beats
programme.desc: Let the world sleep! But here at Kiss we are still up, still delivering the finest beats for your nocturnal jam.

programme.title: Chart Hits & New Vids
programme.desc: We've got all the hits that are storming the charts right now, along with some brand new releases from your favourite and new artists.

programme.title: All The Hits, All Night
programme.desc: Non-stop hits to see you all the way through the night.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers: On the Road
programme.desc: Mike Brewer goes to Germany to buy a Mercedes and gets his hands on a 1984 280SL, but mechanic Edd China is not impressed with its brakes.

programme.title: Combat Dealers
programme.desc: Military equipment collector Bruce Crompton takes on a huge project to restore and rebuild a German Panther tank. But to do so he must part with some Second World War 'halftracks'.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: OCC reveals a bike and a reverse trike for a company, while Mikey seeks counselling from Vinnie.

programme.title: Alaska Mega Machines
programme.desc: Engineers on the Alaskan island of Sitka construct a colossal dam capable of powering an entire town. Plus, Alaska's biggest boat lift hauls a 400-ton fishing ship.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs
programme.desc: Mike Rowe visits California to extract minerals using explosives.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: The processing of almonds and the production of high-end motorcycles. Fish rubbing and clay shooting machines are also considered. Plus, developments in the techniques used over the years.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: Where materials come from and how manufacturing processes have developed over the years, fosusing on candied fruit, linen ukuleles, throttle bottles and limestone mantels.

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: How the Texas Rangers have progressed from a group to protect settlers in the 19th century to a sophisticated law-enforcement agency.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: The case of Susan Casey. When she disappeared, CCTV footage revealed three likely suspects on the scene. However, it was impossible to tell who was responsible until a video demonstrated that someone was lying.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The murder of 34-year-old Susan Casey. The mother-of-four's body was found floating in the Yellowstone River in May 2008, but the autopsy report concluded that she had been strangled. The investigation went cold for a few years until her ex-husband Walter Larson was arrested.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: Agents search for the killers of an elderly couple in a small Ohio community, and face a race against time to catch them before they strike again.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: An emotional case lies in store for Houston SPCA's animal cruelty investigators when they find a puppy that has been badly beaten and has 13 broken bones.

programme.title: Bondi Vet: Coast to Coast
programme.desc: Dr Alex Hynes tries to treat a Labrador-staffy cross that has been attacked by another dog. Plus, carers attend to an American bulldog which has eaten a whole packet of macadamia nuts.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Sarah and her husband visit the salon to find a gown for their 10th anniversary vow renewal, while Jodee wants to look sexy on her wedding day.
